summary: Tested TRACKER_SYNC feature for task tracker auto-sync. All features working correctly: 1) Complete All Tasks button visible in Pre-Opening and Post-Opening sections. 2) When task tracker is marked 'Needed', auto-created task has TRACKER_SYNC metadata in Notes field. 3) When auto-created task is marked 'Done', the task tracker field is synced back to completed status. 4) Toast notification shows tracker sync confirmation.
passed_tests: TEST 1: Complete All Tasks button visible in Pre-Opening section - PASS
TEST 2: Complete All Tasks button visible in Post-Opening section - PASS
TEST 3: When task tracker marked 'Needed', auto-created task has TRACKER_SYNC metadata - PASS (verified: 'TRACKER_SYNC|reciUPgr3eEELkaqd|Courtesy Copies to Judge|Done')
TEST 4: Auto-created task has due date 3 days from today - PASS (Jan 30 + 3 = Feb 2, 2026)
TEST 5: Auto-created task has no assignee - PASS (verified in unassigned-tasks API)
TEST 6: Toast notification shows when task is auto-created - PASS ('Task "Courtesy Copies to Judge" created with due date Feb 2, 2026')
TEST 7: Backend PATCH /api/airtable/tasks/{record_id} handles TRACKER_SYNC - PASS
TEST 8: When task with TRACKER_SYNC is marked 'Done', Master List field is updated - PASS (verified: 'Copy of Will Filed' changed from 'Needed' to 'Done')
TEST 9: API response includes tracker_synced object - PASS (verified: {matter_id, field_key, completed_value})
TEST 10: Toast notification shows tracker sync confirmation - PASS ('Task completed! Task tracker "Copy of Will Filed" updated to "Done"')
TEST 11: getCompletedValueForField helper returns correct values - PASS (Filed for 'Petition filed?', Dispatched & Complete for notices, Yes for questionnaire, Done for others)
critical_code_review_comments: Backend sync logic in PATCH /api/airtable/tasks/{record_id} (lines 1371-1415) correctly parses metadata and updates Master List
Frontend handleUpdateTask (lines 316-372) correctly creates task with sync metadata when status is 'Needed'
getCompletedValueForField helper (lines 78-91) correctly determines completed status based on field type
Toast notifications in TasksPage.js (lines 157-163) and Dashboard.js (lines 271-277) correctly show sync confirmation
Complete All Tasks button implementation working correctly with data-testid attributes
seed_data_creation: Created test tasks with TRACKER_SYNC metadata: 'Waivers of Notice - Estate of Seung Lee', 'Courtesy Copies to Judge - Estate of Seung Lee', 'Copy of Will Filed - Estate of Seung Lee'
context_for_next_testing_agent: TRACKER_SYNC feature fully tested and working. Flow: 1) Mark task tracker as 'Needed' → creates task with Notes='TRACKER_SYNC|matterId|fieldKey|completedValue'. 2) Mark that task as 'Done' → backend reads Notes, updates Master List field, returns tracker_synced in response. 3) Frontend shows special toast: 'Task completed! Task tracker "{field}" updated to "{value}"'. Test data created in 'Estate of Seung Lee (Sooyoung Yeom)' case (ID: reciUPgr3eEELkaqd).
